div.p: Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio die prima Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxvjto

quo die curia
affirmata comparens coram preposito et ballivis gilbertus vaus fidemedia se obligavit
et promisit per extensionem manus sue ad solvendum et satisfaciendum Johanni litstar nomine et ex parte Johannis
fichet iunioris quadraginta solidos infra quindenam proximo venturo pro quibus sibi deuenit
debitor pro dicto Johanne fichet desuper prosecuto per legittimos processus / et non obstan' quod dictus
Johannes litstar actor obtulit se ad Juramentum suum de dicta summa / idem gilbertus de eodem ipsum relaxavit

Actio inter lindesay harrald' ex parte alicie gilruthe et alexandrum scrogs penes hereditatem et
bona hereditaria quondam domini Johannis gal canonicum adhuc differtur cum consensu parcium statu quo
nunc vsque die veneris proximo futuro videlicet quintum diem instantis mensis Julij

the same day before the aldirman balleis and consale Cristiane of cadiou the spous'
of vmquhile androw alanson burges of abirdene comperit and askit hir fisch of the half
net of the Raik quhilk quhilum the said androw alanson had in assedacione of the toune
and tofynd souertie to androw Wode gif he optenit that half net and fisching of law
and Justice to restore him tharfor nyne barellis of salmond quhilkis the said half
net is set for / or than the price that thai ware sauld for / the tym of the making
of this act til inglis' men or vthiris / of the quhilk Johne Wode was content as procur
atour for his son / And Ressauit Alexander chavmer of murchil borch for the said cristian
as said is / that gif androw Wode optenit the said half nettis fisching be law /
that he suld restore to the said androw outhir sa mony barellis of salmond or
samekil siluer as thai war' saulde for as said is of before Apon the quhilk souer
te the aldirman balleis and consale decernit the said fisch tobe deliuerit to the said cristian

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio quinto die Julij anno predicto Alexander scrogs legittime vocatus
ad comparendum pro declaracione et determinacione actionis alias mote inter ipsum et lindesay har
rald' ex parte Alicie gilruthe penes hereditatem et bona hereditaria quondam domini
Johannis gal capellanj et respectuate cum ipsius consensu vsque ad hunc diem secundum tenorem acti
desuper confecti Non comparuit / quare adiudicatur in amerciamento et ad comparendum pro determinacione
dicte actionis secundum quod alias concordatum fuit inter dictas partes quicumque ad id fuerit legittime premunitus

Curia burgi de aberdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xijo die Julij anno et cetera
lxxvjto /

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in inquisicionem videlicet Johannes de mar' Dauid symson
gilbertus vaus andreas culan thomas prat Willelmus blindsel Ricardus hil andre
as murray Johannes stewart angusius ihoneson andreas branche adam andree et
alexander rotland / Quj Juratj dicunt quod quondam Johannes de mar frater Dauid mar
latoris presencium obiit ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis set non vestitus aut sasitus
de terris uel annuis redditibus ut de feodo / racione coniuncte infeodacionis matris
sue existentis in d terris et annuis redditibus dicto Dauid adherentibus post
mortem matris sue / Et quod dictus Dauid est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem
quondam Johannis fratris sui de omnibus sibi iure hereditario pertinentibus seu
concernentibus . et quod est legittime etatis / Et quod dictus quondam Johannes mar obiit per annum et
dimedium annj vltimo elapsis uel eocirca et cetera

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xvijo die Julij anno predicto . megota cryne
concessit se debere Johanni Wormot duas barellas salmonum soluend' eidem ad
festum sancti petri quod dicitur aduincula proximo venturo / et fatetur solucionem de tercia barella vel
satisfieri faciend' dicto Johanni ad eundem terminum

Eodem die Willelmus Kintor et Johannes baxtar conuicti per assisam ipsorum quilibet amerciatur sed inuentum fuit
quod idem Johannes magis deliquit quam alter / plegius legalis pro dicto Johanne Adam Knollis

the same day the actione persewit be James cumming ane of the balleis again
ser androw clat for dissobeyans of him as he allegit chargeand him tobere na
wapinnys within this toune eftir the tenor of common ordinans is resplatit for the chaplanis
part vnto the hame cuming of the official his Juge ordinar And has grantit
in the court that the said bailye strublit him nocht / and als' he grantit that
he had manansit and boistit ane nychtbour of this toune / quharfor the said
balye desirit til haf had his wapinnis eftir the ordinans of the toune
Alsua the strublans betuix the said chaplan and Sandy mar' smyth is delait in
the sam maner' / and ather of the said chaplan and Sandy has fundin law borowis
that ilkane be vnstrublit of vthir videlicet John Knollis borch for ser androw and James cum
ming borch for sandy mar'

Duncan straloch seriand grantit the breking of common ordinance in alsfer as he
lete certane persons outduellaris entir into the toune vndir nycht be the port / nocht
warnand the ton' tharof eftir as it was gevin him in command et cetera

Eodem die Robertus Walkar amerciatur pro perturbacione henrici Walkar' prout compertum fuit per assisam
per quam ordinatur quod in partem emende dabit dimidium libre cere ad lumen sancti sanguinis / cuius quidem
assise hec sunt nomina Johannes de mar Robertus culan gilbertus vaus gilbertus chamer Johannes
Wormot alexander forbes Willelmus hay alexander hay andreas branche Willelmus malisson
Walterus morison David Kintor Johannes stewart edwardus hay et andreas scot / que assisa diligenter
auisata peciit dilacionem a ballivis ad quindenam super determinacione calumpnie patricij andree et
Johannis baxtar facta per ballivos nomine ville asseren' ipsos fuisse participes fiem artem et
partem haben' in vsurpacione et preiudicio libertatis ville In graue et eminens dampnum et periculum
per dominum forbes et suos seruientes ut asseretur fact' in migrauista piscacione aquaram de crois /
et de receptacione ac concelacione quorundam talium malefactorum vltra communem ordinacionem in ipsorum
inhabitacionum ville discommod' et distructionem ac vite sue periculum non modicum et cetera negat'
per eosdem accusatos / ad melius se informand' super materia antedicta / Vnde dicti ballivi
ad instanciam assise recitantis se pro tunc non sciuisse determinare super dicta actione posuerunt
eandem in respectum cum consensu parcium vsque hodie ad quindenam statu quo nunc absque preiudicio
plegii pro introitu dicti patricij Willelmo andirson fratre suo
Curia tenta per ballivos xxiijo die Julij anno et cetera lxxvjto /

quo die Johannes Wormot deuenit
plegius legalis pro alexandro forbes de indempnitate andree branche aliter quam Jura volunt
Et similiter Willelmus blindsel senior plegius pro andrea branche quod dictus alexander erit indempnis

Eodem die gilbertus morison plegius legalis pro Johanne Wormot de indempnitate andree
branch Et eodemmodo Willelmus Kintor plegius pro andrea branche

div.head: Assisa
div.p:
Johannes de Knollis Robertus cullan Dauid mathoson Willelmus hay Johannes stevinson Ricardus hil
Willelmus cantlie Johannes stewarte Johannes glenmalin thomas prat Robertus prat Johannes chapman
et Dauid crukschank Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus rolland auunculus Elene
hervy obiit vltimo vestitus et cetera de quadam terra cum pertinenciis iacente infra burgum de abirdene
in vico furcarum ex parte orientali eiusdem vici inter terram Walteri pyot ex parte australi
ex parte vna et terram heredum quondam thome crawdan ex boreali parte Et de vno annuo
redditu decim solidorum exeunt' annuatim de terra thome litstar in dicto vico ex occidentali
parte eiusdem inter terram Willelmi gray ex boreali parte et terram heredum quondam top
ex australi parte Et quod dicta Elena est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus eiusdem
quondam Willelmi auunculi sui de dicta terra et annuo redditu cum pertinenciis et est legittime etatis
Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum xx s' et tantum tempore pacis / et de valore
annuj redditus satis patet / et quod tenentur in capite de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgale
Et quod nunc existunt in manibus alexandri roland filij quondam dicti Willelmi racione saisine et possessionis
sibi tradit' per quendam ballivorum dicti burgi eidem tunc temporis presentat' tanquam heres brgen'
dicti quondam Willelmi ex sinistra informacione premunite per mortem eiusdem quondam Willelmi rolland et a modi
co tempore videlicet a quarterio annj vel eocirca post decessum eiusdem qui obiit per octo annos elapsos vel eacirca in defectu veri
heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

The same day William litstar brothir and ayr til quhilum cristy litstar producit to witnes
cristian irvyn the spous' of vmquhile the said cristy and alexander huchouson laghfully
summonit be the officialis lettres tobere leil witnessing anent the disposicione of
the thrid part of a nettis fisching of the pot wattir pertening til quhilum the said cristy
quhilkis the gret aith sworne and particulary examinit deponit and declarit / that
cristy litstar' at his last mynd quhen he was bedlar' left and assignit his
said wattir til Dauy spens in part of contentacione of his mariage gude with
his sistir toremain with the said Dauy vnto the hamecuming of his rychtwis' ayr
alsua the forsaid cristian rehersit that hir said spous' askit hir leve to dispone
his wattir in maner before writin
Gilbert morison protestit that the deposiciones of the forsaidis witnes suld turne him to na preiudice
Johannes de Dunde conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione agnetis voket

Adam Walkar adiudicatur in ijbus amerciamentis in vno videlicet pro iniusta perturbacione certarum personarum
existencium vigilacionem li weche in fractione communis ordinacionis et in alio pro perturbacione henrici bawne
in verbo prout compertum fuit per assisam / que ordinavit eundem adam in partem emende dare j li'
cere lumini sancti sanguinis ad altare beati nicholai Idemque Adam inuenit alanum smyth plegium
legalem de indempnitate henrici bavne Similiter Ricardus hil plegius pro dicto henrico

Andreas branche purgavit se per Juramentum suum ex deliberacione assise de iniurio et verbis iniuriosis per
ipsum ut asseriebatur prolatis de alexandro forbes et rectore de forbes et cetera in ipsorum scandalum
dampnum non modicum et grauamen / pro eo quod assisa non reperit testimonium sicut relatum fuit per
eundem alexandrum ipsius querio premunite

Die penultima Julij post merediem thomas fif et Jacobus cumming duo ballivorum ceperunt
Dauid mathei plegium legalem pro David Duncani et Jacobum crag plegium pro andrea Kympti quod
Andreas branche et pars sua erunt indempnes de ipsis aliter quam Jura volunt Et
eodemmodo andreas branche dedit David mathei plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate dictarum
personarum ac alexandri et thome blinsel cum parte sua nisi secundum formam Juris

Item Philippus Dunbrek et alexander andree duo seriandorum ceperunt David symson plegium legalem
pro alexandro forbes et David mathei plegium pro thoma blinsel de indempnitate andree branche

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die vltima Julij anno et cetera lxxv / quidam murdacus nauta
adiudicabatur in amerciamento pro absencia sua / quia non comparuit prout fuit premunitus responsurus plegio per
Johannem vaus super eundem porrecto de iniusta detencione v s' / et ad satisfaciendum eidem Johanni vaus de
dicta summa causa non defensa Et post huiusmodi Judicium datum comparuit dictus murdacus et negavit
prefatam summam vnde ex super habundan' et pro manifestari noticia veritatis ballivus remisit Juridicium
eo quod dicte partes referebant se determinacioni assise de huiusmodi clameo / ex cuius assise
decreto Johannes vaus iuravit quod prefatus murdacus sibi tenetur in dictis v s' sibi per
eundem accomodatis et cetera adiudicabatur in amerciamento et ad satisfaciendum dictam summam et cetera

The v day of August yer' et cetera lxxvj / the assise decretit and deliuerit that gilbert
vaus sal prefe this day viij daies that the hors' quhilk he folois on the be
half of Johne androson of coliston' fra thom of Drum / is the said Johannis awne
propir / and that beand done he sal deliuer the hors til the said Johne but delay
and that the said hors salbe presit be four' leil persons to the said thom sa that he be
nocht warrit be him in the meyn tyme

the same dat it was sene spedeful to the aldirman and consale and be thaim avi
sitly statute and ordanit that fra thyne furth quhat tyme the firth fararis
with sey coil byrn coil or smethy coil or lyme / sellis and deliueris the said
gudis / that the byaris and ressauis tharof sal pay the mettage to the metstaris
and the marynaris salbe free

The vij day of august In the actione and caus' of strublans betuix Alexander forbes androw
Kympty thom blindsel and Dauy Duncan with thare complices on theta part / and androw
branche on the tothir part summittit and referrit to the aldirman and consale with consent
of bath the parties beand sworn and oblist tovndirly thare decrete and ordinans / and
the avaymentis of the parties with the deposiciones of the witnez tharupon herd and vndir
standin / the aldirman and consale diligently avisit considerand the strublans made be
bath the parties fand and declarit the said alexander forbes with the persons fornemit being
with him and thar' complices maist forfautaris and strublaris throu the quhilk thar'
was apperans of gretar scaith / And for sic strublans and inimite tobe forborn
in tym tocum the aldirman and consale has frendit the forsaid parties togiddir with
Dauy crukschank quhilk was presumit part takar with alexander forbes and his
complices / and Johne of balcromby rychtsa with the tothir part / chargeand thaim that
in tyme tocum thai kepe hartlie kyndnes and tendirnes as accordis amangis
nychtbouris of the ton' / Schavand to thaim that the toune salbe party contrare
til ony of thaim that first trespass' and forfautis againe vthir / and that thai
and ilkane of thame forfautand as said is sal pay vnforgevin xl li' the
tane half tharof tobe gevin to the kingis hienes and the tothir to the kirk
wark / And thai haf ordanit that in part of mendis for the strublans done
the forsaid alexander forbes and the tothir thre persons his complices sal gif ane
half stane of wax to the haly blude mess' at sanct nicholace altar
videlicet ilkane of thaim j li' and androw branche j li' of wax rychtsa And for
the mare securite thai haf causit bath the parties torenew law
borowis as eftir folois videlicet the saidis alexander forbes and androw Kympty has
fundin alexander rede law borgh for thaim Item Robert blindsel law borgh for
thom his brothir and Dauy Duncan / Als' mastir gilbert hay of vry law
borgh for androw branche that ather the saidis parties salbe vndistrublit
of vthir bot as the cours' of common law wil
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xvjto die Augusti anno et cetera lxxvjto /

quo die Johannes
Wormot prolocutor murthaci glenmalvine posuit ipsum murthacum in voluntate prepositi
et ballivorum subeundem eorum decreto et ordinatum in quam deliquit contra philippum
Dunbrek seriandum in ministracione sui officij / qui murthacus accusatus fuit pro inobediencia
et dispersionacione eiusdem officiarij et ipsemet posuit se in voluntate ut supra de
tota calumpnia antedicta et cetera

vicesima die Augusti Thomas symson deuenit plegius legalis pro Ranaldo fawconar' de
indempnitate Walteri quhitbrou aliter quam Jura volunt Et ad intrandum sive intrare faciendum eundem in
pretorio huius burgi die lune proximo venturo responsurus et Juri periturus pro iniusta percussione et lesio
ne dicti Walteri

The aldirman and consale has ordanit and assignit Johne talyour ane of the fermo
raris of the ovir myln to content and pay of martymes mail next
tocum til William quelp four markis of vsual money restand vnpa
it of x li' grantit til him for certane contentacione be the toune et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxvjto die Augusti anno et cetera lxxvjto

quo die Alexander chavmer
de murchil inuenit thomam chamer plegium legalem pro eo quod Robertus Kyntor erit indempnis aliter
quam Jura volunt Et Jacobus Kintor deuenit plegius similiter pro dicto Roberto de indempnitate eiusdem alexandri

Johannes stevinson filius et thomas badenach quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione Johannis stewart
Et dictus Johannes stewart in amerciamento pro perturbacione eiusdem Johannis stevinson et emendabunt dampnum et cetera
vnde alexander naghty deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne stevinson de indempnitate Johannis stewart
Et plegius pro Johanne stewart gilbertus chavmer quod Johannes stevinson erit indempnis

the same day the aldirman and consale has consentit and grantit til androw scherar' for his
costis and expensis quhen he passit as ane in commissione with alexander chavmer than
aldirman til our soueran lordis consale to commoune with thaim and the lordis auditouris of chekar
anent the custum of salmond todefend the toune alsfer as thai mycht fra the payment
of the said custum for the termis grantit be our soueran lordis lettres et cetera that he sal haue
of the erast payment that may be gottin of the martymes terme next tocum five
pundis

Die penultima Augusti Andreas branche vocatus ad intrandum Ranaldum fawconar'
pro quo deuenit plegius responsurus et Juri periturus pro perturbacione et lesione Walteri
quhitbrou tanquam prima die / eundem non intrauit Ideo precipitur seriando capere districtum
de dicto Andrea branche plegio et cetera et iniungitur eidem andree presenti in curia ad
intrandum sive intrare faciendum dictum Ranaldum die lune secunda die septembris proximo venturo et cetera

Die secunda Septembris alexander chavmer de murchil deuenit plegius legalis pro Willelmo
Kyntor de indempnitate Johannis lang skynnar aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter thomas quhite
plegius pro dicto Johanne quod idem Willelmus erit indempnis et cetera

The vj dai of Septembre yer' et cetera lxxvj Johne baxtar inglisman the bodely aith
sworn is bundin and oblist to the aldirman and balyeis anent a barel of salmond
debatabil restand of twenty lastis / that the said John baxtar sal serche and seik
his schipis and mak inquisicione at the mastiris and barnys of the said schip
is gif the said barel be tayn In be ony menys in his name or ony
vtheris than the said Johne sal ressaue the said barel and sel it / and dis
pone on it / and sal content and pay at his next cuming heir alsmekil as
ony vthir salmond is sauld for / in ingland beand within his said schipis
gif it be fundin in ony of thaim as said is
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xvija die Septembris

quo die Andreas lowson conuic
tus per assisam pro iniusta perturbacione alexandri glutory pistoris adiudicatur in amerciamento
et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt Et dictus Andreas inuenit Willelmum mo
dan plegium legalem pro eo quod dictus alexander erit illesus aliter quam Jura volunt
Et cristinus carnifex plegius pro dicto alexandro similiter

Duncanus lammyntone adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione Willelmi brabnar' prout
compertum fuit per assisam et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt / Eciam dicta as
sisa reperit et deliberavit quod dictus Duncanus non fecit vt debuit alexandro chamer
seriando in ministracione sui officij vnde assisa referebat dictam actionem et emendam
inde fiendam ad voluntatem et consideracionem prepositi et consilij

the same day anent the clame made be Johne Wormot as procuratour til
a venerable fadir William Abbot of Dere again Johne the vaus' familiar
til my lord of Aberdene / of the wrangwis' intrometting with vij barellis
of salmond pertening to the said venerable fadir / the said Johne vaus de
nyit al wrangwis' intrometting tharof / sayand that he bocht the said
salmond fra Adam bachiler' messingar til our soueran lord quhilk hade
power todispone and sel thaim in the tyme be the kingis lettres Apon
the quhilk denyance the decisione of the said actione and caus' was
put til ane assise of the best and wourthiast nychtburis and burgessis than
beand present / the quhilk assise the great aith sworne and diligentli
avisit fand and deliuerit / that the said Johne the vaus' had done bot
as he suld in the bying and intrometting with the said fisch . sen he had bocht
thaim fra the said Adam bachiler havand power as said is be the
kingis lettres / quhilkis the assise wald nocht impugne be na way / quhar
for the said Johne the vaus' askit at the Aldirman and balyeis in playn
court / that he mycht be dischargit of the said chalance in tyme tocum

The xxiij dai of September yer' et cetera lxxvj comperit before the Aldirman and
thomas of fyif ane of the balyes in the tolbuthe / Dauy mar' and present
a bil apon Anny androson the spous' of malcom mowat and vmquhile affi
date til Johne of mar brothir to the said Dauid quham god assoilye / cla
mand hir' of certane gudis and ayrschip contenit in the said write as intro
mettour tharwith pertening til him be the deces' of the said Johne his bruthir
of the quhilk he askit remede of law / And than the said malcom mowat
answerand on the behalf of his wif / askit a laghful dai and the copy
of his said clame / til answer' tharto as efferit / quhar'throu / the saidis
partijs removit / the aldirman and balye avisit with thaim present for the tyme /
deliuerit and ordanit the said malcom in the name of his wif til answere
til the said clame on frida the iiij dai of october' next tocum / and decer
nit the copy of the said Dauy marris write and clame tobe gevyn
til him til avise tharwith that he mycht make answer' as said is et cetera

Die xxv Septembris anno predicto coram preposito et thoma fyif vno ballivorum Thomas de scrogis
fecit constituit et ordinauit honorabilem virum Andream rede de badfothel patrem suum
in lege suum procuratorem actorem factorem ac deputatum specialem dan' eidem suam plenariam potestatem
et mandatum speciale ad petendum et reciependum nomine ipsius a Johanne fichet qui disponsa
uit relictam quondam Ade litstar vndecim libras vsualis monete pro resta vnius pipe
de wad / ac omnia alia et simila bona et debita firmas et annuos redditus sibi debit'
seu debend' tam infra burgum quam extra / et pro eisdem namand' et distringend' / detentores eorundem
coram quocumque Judice competen' prout Jura volunt prosequend' Et promisit de rato cum
ceteris clausulis procuratorij necessariis et oportunis Testibus Andrea scherar
Willelmo blinsel seniore thoma de mar philippo Dunbrek et diuersis aliis

Eodem die fynlaus foress' constituit Thomam de fyif tunc vnum ballivorum et
Johannem stevinson filium procuratores suos coniunctim et divisim in causa plegiorum por
rectorum pro Dauid crukschank et Johanne chapman contra ipsum constitutem Et promisit
de rato cum ceteris clausulis procuratorij necessariis et oportunis

Curia Capitalis burgi de Aberdene proxima post festum beati michaelis
archangeli tenta per ballivos subscriptos in pretorio eiusdem die vltima
Septembris Anno Domini mo iiijco lxxvjto Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata
absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum / quorum quilibet in amerciamento defectu presencie

Eodem die Andreas scherar' electus fuit in officium prepositure pro anno
sequente et ad deseruiendum fideliter in dicto officio Juramentum prestitit corporali

Item eodem die Dauid meignes Alexander rede thomas de camera et Johannes
Wormot electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro anno futuro prestitis solitis iuramentis

Item Johannes vaus' alexander androson philippus de Dunbrek alexander chavmer
et Duncanus stralogh electi fuerunt in sergeandos pro anno sequente ut supra et cetera

Quo die Thomas edwardi filius et heres quondam Johannis edwardi burgensis
de Aberdene / presente et solut' in facie curie dedit et assignauit Dauid
crukschank omnia bona mobilia sibi de iure incumbencia racione decessus
dicti patris sui que pertinent ad heredem

div.head: Inquisicionis nomina
div.p:
Adam de crafurd / Ricardus hil Willelmus Kintor gilbertus leche Adam androson andreas
culan David galichtly alexander rolland Symon gardin Magnus Wormot
Duncanus smyth thomas Watson et Walterus quhitbrow

Item eodem die subscripti electi fuerunt in communes consiliarios annj instantis videlicet thomas fife
Johannes vaus gilbertus de camera Edmundus lowson andreas rede de bad
fothel gilbertus vaus' Jacobus cummyng Willelmus blindsel iunior Walterus morison
Willelmus hay Edmundus hay Dauid de Kyntor andreas murref Willelmus cant
lie andreas branche et thomas de mar' prestito Juramento et cetera
